string-array.name: wink_calibration_first_wink_hints
string-array.item: Not too fast, not too slow. Mimic the video
Can you see all four corners of the screen?
Make sure that your hair is not in the way

string-array.name: wink_calibration_following_wink_hints
string-array.item: Wink again, with your right eye
Not too fast, not too slow. Mimic the video
Can you see all four corners of the screen?
Make sure that your hair is not in the way

string-array.name: wink_calibration_tip_card_contents
string-array.item: Gaze through the display when you wink
The display should be fully visible during calibration
No hair should be between your eye and the device
"Wink still not working? We're on it. Stay tuned"
